StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: The Collaboration to Assess Risk and Identify LoNG-term outcomes for Children with COVID (CARING for Children with COVID): MUSIC “Long-TerM OUtcomes after the Multisystem Inflammatory Syndrome In Children”

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS AT CHICAGOUNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The MUSIC study is supported and conducted in collaboration with the Pediatric Heart Network and is supported by grants (HL135680, HL135685, HL135683, HL135689, HL135646, HL135665, HL135678, HL135682, HL135666, HL135691, HL068270) from the NHLBI, NIH and and the Collaboration to Assess Risk and Identify LoNG-term outcomes for Children with COVID accession number(s) and/or study DOIs >, and were accessed from the <insert databases such BioData Catalyst (biodatacatalyst.nhlbi.nih.gov/), Kids First Data Resource Portal (kidsfirstdrc.org), ImmPort (immport.org), and/or dbGaP (www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap)>. - Link it to the BioProject page (which NCBI folks can help with; bioprojecthelp@ncbi.nlm.nih.gov): https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/?term=PRJNA759601 . The authors also wish to thank the staffs and participants of MUSIC. For publications, written, and/or oral presentations resulting from use of this data, please cite the following information: “The original data description for MUSIC: “Long-TerM OUtcomes after the Multisystem Inflammatory Syndrome In Children” can be found here: (Journal Citation __________)(PMID __________). The original data used for the analysis in this publication can be found in the NIH database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP) under the accession number phs______.”

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: GSR does not apply (ONLY for studies that will not have genomic data in dbGaP)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.
